Message:
I heard the Princess was
also raised without
being called by name.

Doing so was seen
as utterly insolent,
and even her own relatives
would not be forgiven.

“Asahi, I shall grant thee
special permission to
call me by my name.”

The Princess then
offered her hand to me...

but I’m a shadow.
Someone like me will
never be forgiven.

“I must refuse, my princess.
...For I am but a shadow.”

The Princess smiled hearing
those words, hints of sadness
written on her face.

All that she said was,
“Yes...that thou art,”
before leaving my sight.

Several days later.
I was in a fight with
yet another assassin,
till the moment our weapons
cut into each other.

...To think that this assassin
coated their blade...
with poison...

...There’s no chance of
me surviving this attack...

...But, I have no regrets.
I was able to protect
the Princess, after all...

...My princess...
I’m glad to have served
as your shadow...
